subject: Soccer
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Fire selected midfielder Jack Harrison from Wake Forest with the first overall pick in the M.L.S. draft, then traded him to New York City F.C.
snippet: The Chicago Fire selected midfielder Jack Harrison from Wake Forest with the first overall pick in the M.L.S. draft, then traded him to New York City F.C.
